titleStmt.title: Robin Hood and the bishop. Shewing how Robin Hood went to an old womans house, and changed cloaths with her to escape from the bishop: and how he robbed him of all his gold, and made him sing mass. To the tune of, Robin Hood and the stranger.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
